meanings.definition: The action of withdrawing from a situation or involvement.
meanings.sent1: After the meeting, his disengagement was evident as he quickly left the room.
meanings.sent2: Her disengagement from the project surprised everyone.
meanings.sent3: During the game, his sudden disengagement made his teammates laugh.
meanings.sent4: The disengagement of the train cars symbolized the end of their journey.
meanings.sent5: The disengagement of the puzzle pieces made it easier to solve.

meanings.definition: The state of being detached or separated.
meanings.sent1: His disengagement from the group was noticeable as he stood alone.
meanings.sent2: The disengagement of the two countries led to peace talks.
meanings.sent3: The disengagement of the cat from the yarn left a mess on the floor.
meanings.sent4: The disengagement of the moon from the clouds revealed a clear night sky.
meanings.sent5: The disengagement of the old building from the new construction was necessary for renovation.

meanings.definition: The act of releasing or disconnecting.
meanings.sent1: The disengagement of the lock allowed the door to open.
meanings.sent2: His disengagement from the conversation was abrupt.
meanings.sent3: The disengagement of the phone call left her feeling confused.
meanings.sent4: The disengagement of the cable caused the TV to lose signal.
meanings.sent5: The disengagement of the plug from the socket prevented a power surge.
